newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Brent steady after overnight decline.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Brent steady after overnight decline.

text.p: August Brent futures were steady on SIMEX on Thursday, helped by a modest rebound in NYMEX prices after overnight falls both sides of the Atlantic, brokers said.
August Brent was quoted at $18.20/$18.34 per barrel after London fell 16 to $18.22.
NYMEX August was last traded on ACCESS at $19.50 per barrel, up four cents from New York.
